title: I suck at lol bad
body: Hi all i suck at lol bad as the title says i always feed my average kda is terrible and my peak is @ silver 3 and i got carried there by mistake thanks in advance :)

replies.body: ty all for the immediate responses :D i am mainly bad  @ i often end up getting %%%% on in lane to the point they just tower dive and get a clean killand my last hitting is decent depending on what champion it is. and ill tkae you up on your offer dota :D and ill try going into a customs bots when i have some spare time

If you want, you can add me for a 1v1 in a custom game.


I will try to go easy on you and tell you your mistakes and how you can improve.


disclaimer- not best player, laning is just my strongest feature
Um so what was the point to this thread? I mean your kinda just saying "I'm bad" did you want advice from people or something?

Try focusing on the things that you're bad at, for example: 

- Creep Score - Go on a custom game and practice last hitting

- Getting combos right - A custom game with a tanky bot or watch some clips by pros, etc.

Just find out the thing you're bad at and try to get better at it c:
